name: Ciro Caputo Viglione

top_projects.name: T16
top_projects.description: Topo T16, Midi Controller with magnetic switches

unwndevices/T16.summary: Recent activities in the T16 repository include several push events focusing on bug fixes and improvements, such as a serial fix, adjusting the max brightness, and enhancements to hardware boot testing, with the most recent push occurring on December 3, 2024.

profile_summary:
Ciro Caputo Viglione is a highly skilled software developer with a strong foundation in programming languages, including C++, C, and JavaScript. With a robust portfolio of 21 public repositories, he showcases his active involvement in development projects, demonstrating his ability to design, implement, and maintain complex software systems. As a respected member of the development community, he has garnered a following of 6 professionals, underscoring his influence and reputation among peers. His expertise in C++ and C enables him to build high-performance applications, while his proficiency in JavaScript facilitates the creation of dynamic web applications.

As a seasoned developer, Ciro Caputo Viglione brings a unique combination of technical expertise and innovative thinking to the table. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for solving complex problems, he delivers high-quality solutions that meet and exceed expectations. His strong technical skills, combined with his collaborative approach and commitment to excellence, make him a valuable asset to any development team. Whether he is working on a cutting-edge project or contributing to open-source initiatives, Ciro Caputo Viglione consistently demonstrates his expertise and dedication to the field, solidifying his position as a trusted and accomplished software developer.
